verses.verse: All <WH3605> the commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117> shall you observe <WH8104> to do, <WH6213> that you may live, <WH2421> and multiply, <WH7235> and go <WH935> in and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers. <WH1>

And you shall remember <WH2142> all <WH3605> the way <WH1870> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> led <WH3212> you these <WH2088> forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness, <WH4057> to humble <WH6031> you, and to prove <WH5254> you, to know <WH3045> what <WH853> <WH834> was in your heart, <WH3824> whether you would keep <WH8104> his commandments, <WH4687> or no. <WH3808>

And he humbled <WH6031> you, and suffered you to hunger, <WH7456> and fed <WH398> you with manna, <WH4478> which <WH834> you knew <WH3045> not, neither <WH3808> did your fathers <WH1> know; <WH3045> that he might make you know <WH3045> that man <WH120> does not live <WH2421> by bread <WH3899> only, <WH905> but by every <WH3605> word that proceeds <WH4161> out of the mouth <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> does man <WH120> live. <WH2421>
Your raiment <WH8071> waxed not old <WH1086> on you, neither <WH3808> did your foot <WH7272> swell, <WH1216> these <WH2088> forty <WH705> years. <WH8141>
You shall also consider <WH3045> in your heart, <WH3824> that, as a man <WH376> chastens <WH3256> his son, <WH1121> so the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> chastens <WH3256> you.
Therefore you shall keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> to walk <WH3212> in his ways, <WH1870> and to fear <WH3372> him.

For the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> brings <WH935> you into <WH413> a good <WH2896> land, <WH776> a land <WH776> of brooks <WH5158> of water, <WH4325> of fountains <WH5869> and depths <WH8415> that spring <WH3318> out of valleys <WH1237> and hills; <WH2022>
A land <WH776> of wheat, <WH2406> and barley, <WH8184> and vines, <WH1612> and fig <WH8384> trees, and pomegranates; <WH7416> a land <WH776> of oil <WH8081> olive, <WH2132> and honey; <WH1706>

A land <WH776> wherein <WH834> you shall eat <WH398> bread <WH3899> without <WH3808> scarceness, <WH4544> you shall not lack <WH2637> any <WH3605> thing in it; a land <WH776> whose <WH834> stones <WH68> are iron, <WH1270> and out of whose hills <WH2042> you may dig <WH2672> brass. <WH5178>
When you have eaten <WH398> and are full, <WH7646> then you shall bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> for the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which <WH834> he has given <WH5414> you.

Beware <WH8104> that you forget <WH7911> not the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> in not keeping <WH8104> his commandments, <WH4687> and his judgments, <WH4941> and his statutes, <WH2708> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day: <WH3117>
Lest <WH6435> when you have eaten <WH398> and are full, <WH7646> and have built <WH1129> goodly <WH2896> houses, <WH1004> and dwelled <WH3427> therein;
And when your herds <WH1241> and your flocks <WH6629> multiply, <WH7235> and your silver <WH3701> and your gold <WH2091> is multiplied, <WH7235> and all <WH3605> that you have is multiplied; <WH7235>

Then your heart <WH3824> be lifted <WH7311> up, and you forget <WH7911> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which brought <WH3318> you forth <WH4161> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> from the house <WH1004> of bondage; <WH5650>

Who led <WH3212> you through that great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> wilderness, <WH4057> wherein were fiery <WH8314> serpents, <WH5175> and scorpions, <WH6137> and drought, <WH6774> where <WH834> there was no <WH369> water; <WH4325> who brought <WH3318> you forth <WH4161> water <WH4325> out of the rock <WH6697> of flint; <WH2496>

Who fed <WH398> you in the wilderness <WH4057> with manna, <WH4478> which <WH834> your fathers <WH1> knew <WH3045> not, that he might humble <WH6031> you, and that he might prove <WH5254> you, to do you good <WH3190> at your latter <WH319> end;
And you say <WH559> in your heart, <WH3824> My power <WH3581> and the might <WH6108> of my hand <WH3027> has gotten <WH6213> me this <WH2088> wealth. <WH2428>

But you shall remember <WH2142> the LORD <WH3068> your God: <WH430> for it is he that gives <WH5414> you power <WH3581> to get <WH6213> wealth, <WH2428> that he may establish <WH6965> his covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to your fathers, <WH1> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And it shall be, if <WH518> you do at all forget <WH7911> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and walk <WH1980> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and serve <WH5647> them, and worship <WH7812> them, I testify <WH5749> against you this day <WH3117> that you shall surely <WH3588> perish. <WH6>

As the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> destroys <WH6> before your face, so <WH3651> shall you perish; <WH6> because <WH6118> you would not be obedient <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
